page.title: 13Views around Lytham.
page.content: In St.Davids Road North there are semi-detached and terraced houses.There are ten shops and at the junction of Heeley Rd.there is a garage called M. Chadwick's which sells Vauxhall and Opel cars.There are many alley ways and backyards. The Clubhouse of St.Annes Old Links Golf Club is a very large,impressive building.The Golf Club runs parallel to the railway line to the east is the airport.From the bridge on Highbury Rd.you can see a clear view of Blackpool in particular.The Pleasure Beach,Pontin's Holiday Camp,Squires Gate Station,Blackpool Tower and Blackpool F.C.football ground,can be picked out.On the bridge is the remains of an old street lamp and a railway sign for Gillot's crossing, where trains would stop by request.
